org.araneaframework.http.filter
Class StandardThreadCloningFilterService

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.framework.core.BaseFilterService
              org.araneaframework.http.filter.StandardThreadCloningFilterService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, FilterService, Serializable, Service, ThreadCloningContext
public class StandardThreadCloningFilterService
extends BaseFilterService
implements ThreadCloningContext

Filter that clones session threads upon requests and redirects request to cloned session thread. Should always be configured as the first thread-level filter.

Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

clone

protected Relocatable.RelocatableService clone(Relocatable.RelocatableService service)
                                        throws Exception
Clones given Relocatable.RelocatableService. Clone is created by first serializing and then deserializing given service. Created clone does not have Environment.

Returns:
clone (without Environment) of given Relocatable.RelocatableService.
Throws:
Exception

takeSnapshot

protected byte[] takeSnapshot(Relocatable.RelocatableService service)

startClonedThread

public String startClonedThread(Relocatable.RelocatableService clone)
Wraps the cloned service in a new StandardThreadCloningFilterService, attaches it to ThreadContext.
  • created service should not be decorated relocatable again, because clone is relocatable already
  • new StandardThreadCloningFilterService's childService may not be reinited!
This method is public and part of ThreadCloningContext interface since Aranea 1.1.

Specified by:
startClonedThread in interface ThreadCloningContext
Parameters:
clone - cloned service to start as new session level thread
Returns:
thread id assigned to wrapped service

acquireThreadSnapshot

public byte[] acquireThreadSnapshot()
Description copied from interface: ThreadCloningContext
Returns the snapshot of current thread, made before child Service of ThreadCloningContext implementation has had the chance to process the request. Only applicable when request contained either ThreadCloningContext.CLONE_ONLY_REQUEST_KEY or ThreadCloningContext.CLONING_REQUEST_KEY parameter. Deserialization of the snapshot could be done as follows:

ObjectInputStream ois = new ObjectInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(acquireSerializedThread())); RelocatableService clone = (RelocatableService) ois.readObject();

Snapshot may then be started as cloned thread with ThreadCloningContext.startClonedThread(Relocatable.RelocatableService).

Specified by:
acquireThreadSnapshot in interface ThreadCloningContext
Returns:
serialized snapshot of current thread or null
